alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:29PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Galveston, northeastern Brazoria and southeastern Harris Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 128 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Danbury, or 9 miles northeast of Angleton, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Pearland, League City, southern Friendswood, Alvin, Dickinson, Santa Fe, Manvel, Danbury, Hillcrest, Liverpool and Chocolate Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brazoria; Coastal Galveston; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
